job.title: Software Engineer, Integration Engineering

job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtOne Medical is a primary care platform challenging the industry status quo by making quality care more affordable accessible and employeesltbrgtltbrgtOn January 31 2020 we marked a milestone with our public listing on Nasdaq but our work is far from over As we continue to grow and broaden our impact were building a diverse driven and empathetic team while working hard to cultivate an environment where everyone can thriveltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtThe OpportunityltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThis is a handson technical role make these processes efficient and scalable This will involve regular client collaborations improving documentation and helping to troubleshoot technical issues that may
